#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Vue du tableau de bord principal (Dashboard) de CHNeoWave.

Auteur: Architecte Logiciel en Chef (ALC)
Date: 2024-12-20
Version: 1.0.0
"""

from PySide6.QtWidgets import QWidget, QVBoxLayout, QHBoxLayout, QLabel, QFrame, QPushButton, QGraphicsOpacityEffect, QSplitter, QGridLayout
from PySide6.QtCore import Qt, QPropertyAnimation, QEasingCurve, Signal
from PySide6.QtGui import QPalette, QColor, QFont

from hrneowave.gui.layouts.fibonacci_grid_mixin import FibonacciGridMixin
from hrneowave.gui.components.phi_card import PhiCard
from hrneowave.gui.components.performance_widget import PerformanceWidget, create_memory_collector, create_thread_collector
from hrneowave.core.performance_monitor import PerformanceMonitor
import pyqtgraph as pg



[docs]
class DashboardView(QWidget):
    """Vue principale affichant les indicateurs de performance clés (KPI) et un aperçu.

    Hérite de FibonacciGridMixin pour un layout harmonieux.
    """
    acquisitionRequested = Signal()



[docs]
    def __init__(self, parent: QWidget = None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setObjectName("DashboardView")

        self.fft_plot_widget = None # Initialisation différée
        
        # Système de monitoring de performance
        self.performance_monitor = PerformanceMonitor()
        self.performance_widget = None  # Initialisation différée
        
        self._setup_ui()
        self._animate_cards()
        self._setup_performance_monitoring()



    def _setup_ui(self):
        """Initialise les composants de l'interface utilisateur."""
        main_layout = QHBoxLayout(self)
        self.setLayout(main_layout)

        # --- Splitter pour le Golden Ratio ---
        splitter = QSplitter(Qt.Horizontal)
        main_layout.addWidget(splitter)

        # --- Panneau de gauche (KPIs) ---
        kpi_panel = QWidget()
        kpi_layout = QVBoxLayout(kpi_panel)
        kpi_grid_layout = QGridLayout()
        kpi_layout.addLayout(kpi_grid_layout)

        self.buffer_card = PhiCard("Utilisation Buffer", "0%", size="sm")
        self.disk_card = PhiCard("Espace Disque", "N/A", size="sm")
        self.cpu_card = PhiCard("Charge CPU", "0%", size="sm")
        self.probes_card = PhiCard("Nb Sondes", "0", size="sm")
        self.time_card = PhiCard("Temps écoulé", "0s", size="sm")
        
        kpi_grid_layout.addWidget(self.buffer_card, 0, 0)
        kpi_grid_layout.addWidget(self.disk_card, 0, 1)
        kpi_grid_layout.addWidget(self.cpu_card, 0, 2)
        kpi_grid_layout.addWidget(self.probes_card, 1, 0)
        kpi_grid_layout.addWidget(self.time_card, 1, 1)

        kpi_layout.addStretch()

        self.start_calibration_button = QPushButton("Démarrer la calibration")
        self.start_calibration_button.setObjectName("PrimaryButton")
        self.start_calibration_button.clicked.connect(self.acquisitionRequested) # Temporaire, pointera vers le wizard
        kpi_layout.addWidget(self.start_calibration_button, 0, Qt.AlignBottom)

        # --- Panneau de droite (Graphique et Performance) ---
        self.right_panel = QWidget()
        self.right_panel_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.right_panel)
        self.right_panel_layout.setContentsMargins(0,0,0,0)
        
        # Splitter vertical pour graphique FFT et monitoring
        right_splitter = QSplitter(Qt.Vertical)
        
        # Container pour le graphique FFT
        self.fft_container = QWidget()
        self.fft_container_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.fft_container)
        self.fft_container_layout.setContentsMargins(0,0,0,0)
        
        # Container pour le monitoring de performance
        self.performance_container = QWidget()
        self.performance_container_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.performance_container)
        self.performance_container_layout.setContentsMargins(0,0,0,0)
        
        right_splitter.addWidget(self.fft_container)
        right_splitter.addWidget(self.performance_container)
        
        # Répartition 60/40 entre graphique et monitoring
        right_splitter.setSizes([600, 400])
        
        self.right_panel_layout.addWidget(right_splitter)

        splitter.addWidget(kpi_panel)
        splitter.addWidget(self.right_panel)

        # Appliquer le Golden Ratio
        total_width = self.width()
        phi = 1.618
        splitter.setSizes([int(total_width / (phi + 1)), int(total_width * phi / (phi + 1))])

    def _animate_cards(self):
        """Anime l'apparition des cartes KPI via QGraphicsOpacityEffect."""
        cards = [self.buffer_card, self.disk_card, self.cpu_card, self.probes_card, self.time_card]
        for i, card in enumerate(cards):
            effect = QGraphicsOpacityEffect(card)
            card.setGraphicsEffect(effect)
            anim = QPropertyAnimation(effect, b"opacity")
            anim.setDuration(300 + i * 100)  # Délai en cascade de 100ms
            anim.setStartValue(0.0)
            anim.setEndValue(1.0)
            anim.setEasingCurve(QEasingCurve.InOutCubic)
            anim.start(QPropertyAnimation.DeleteWhenStopped)

    def showEvent(self, event):
        """Crée les widgets uniquement lorsque la vue devient visible."""
        super().showEvent(event)
        
        # Création du graphique FFT
        if self.fft_plot_widget is None:
            self.fft_plot_widget = pg.PlotWidget(parent=self)
            self.fft_plot_widget.setBackground('transparent')
            self.fft_plot_item = self.fft_plot_widget.getPlotItem()
            self.fft_plot_item.setTitle("Aperçu FFT Temps Réel")
            self.fft_plot_item.setLabel('left', 'Amplitude')
            self.fft_plot_item.setLabel('bottom', 'Fréquence (Hz)')
            self.fft_curve = self.fft_plot_item.plot(pen='c')
            self.fft_container_layout.addWidget(self.fft_plot_widget)
        
        # Création du widget de performance
        if self.performance_widget is None:
            self.performance_widget = PerformanceWidget(parent=self)
            
            # Ajout de collecteurs personnalisés pour CHNeoWave
            self.performance_widget.add_custom_metric("python_memory", create_memory_collector)
            self.performance_widget.add_custom_metric("active_threads", create_thread_collector)
            
            self.performance_container_layout.addWidget(self.performance_widget)
            
            # Démarrage automatique du monitoring
            self.performance_widget.start_monitoring()




    def update_kpis(self, buffer_usage: float, cpu_load: float):
        """Met à jour les valeurs des cartes KPI."""
        self.buffer_card.set_content(f"{buffer_usage:.1f}%")
        self.cpu_card.set_content(f"{cpu_load:.1f}%")

    def _setup_performance_monitoring(self):
        """Configure le système de monitoring de performance"""
        # Configuration des seuils d'alerte via l'objet thresholds
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.cpu_warning = 70.0
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.cpu_critical = 90.0
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.memory_warning = 75.0
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.memory_critical = 90.0
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.disk_warning = 80.0
        self.performance_monitor.thresholds.disk_critical = 95.0
        
        # Connexion des signaux pour mise à jour des KPIs
        self.performance_monitor.metrics_updated.connect(self._update_kpis_from_monitor)
        
        # Démarrage du monitoring en arrière-plan
        self.performance_monitor.start_monitoring()
    
    def _update_kpis_from_monitor(self, metrics):
        """Met à jour les KPIs depuis les métriques du monitor."""
        if hasattr(metrics, 'cpu_usage'):
            self.cpu_card.set_content(f"{metrics.cpu_usage:.1f}%")
        
        if hasattr(metrics, 'memory_used_mb') and hasattr(metrics, 'memory_available_mb'):
            total_memory = metrics.memory_used_mb + metrics.memory_available_mb
            memory_percent = (metrics.memory_used_mb / total_memory) * 100 if total_memory > 0 else 0
            self.buffer_card.set_content(f"{memory_percent:.1f}%")
        
        if hasattr(metrics, 'disk_used_gb') and hasattr(metrics, 'disk_total_gb'):
            disk_percent = (metrics.disk_used_gb / metrics.disk_total_gb) * 100 if metrics.disk_total_gb > 0 else 0
            self.disk_card.set_content(f"{disk_percent:.1f}%")
        
        if hasattr(metrics, 'active_threads'):
            self.probes_card.set_content(str(metrics.active_threads))

    def update_fft_plot(self, freqs, amps):
        """Met à jour le graphe FFT."""
        if self.fft_curve is not None:
            self.fft_curve.setData(freqs, amps)

    def closeEvent(self, event):
        """Gestionnaire de fermeture pour arrêter le monitoring."""
        if hasattr(self, 'performance_monitor'):
            self.performance_monitor.stop_monitoring()
        
        if hasattr(self, 'performance_widget') and self.performance_widget:
            self.performance_widget.stop_monitoring()
        
        super().closeEvent(event)
